��이가
A der Riemen für die Land! A der Riemen für die Land!
Aroar, aroar, all my dearest,
My delight for I will see.
Come on down, o'er nosy caravans,
Aroar, aroar, all my dearest,
Roy de gana, Roy de gana,
Hail the work of sugar high!
Hail the work of sugar high!
Roy de gana, Roy de gana,
Hail the work of sugar high!
Hail the work of sugar high!
